text: nivu granthadavarige, ella bageya puravegalannu odagisidaru avaru nim'ma dikkannu anusarisalararu. Hageye, nivu avara dikkannu anusarisalariri. Avaru (yahudigalu mattu kraistaru) parasparara dikkannu anusarisalararu. Innu nim'ma balige jnanavu bandu bitta balikavu nivu a janara icchegalannu anusarisidare, nivu akramigala salige seruviri
